description: woman seated on ground holding baby, LLC; two other squatting children playing near ramp from houseboat; two cats or dogs play on ramp; two small boats at right with figures fishing
provenance: [Conrad R. Graber Fine Art, Riverwood, Maryland, until 2004; sold in April for RTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2004-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A. Lepère.]; LRC, in black ink: [A Lepère 3/35]
title: House Boat
